ygData.subject: Re: Twinking (Was Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort  of))
ygData.msgSnippet: Just curious. I know if you give a necro s pet a weapon after a certain level, they get really upset - the pet is nerfed compaired to the damage it would do
ygData.messageBody:
Just curious.

I know if you give a necro's pet a weapon after a certain level, they get
really upset - the pet is 'nerfed' compaired to the damage it would do with
the weapon.

Hmmm, this smells like an exploit fighting harder skele's to me, or does it
work differently?



At 09:47 AM 7/22/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
>Yes you can place items on mobs. Often times when I forage something, or
>just got done looting a mob, and another agro mob attacks, I simply click
>the item to the mod, kill it then retrieve the items.
>
>Which if bards had a more permanent charm song could really make a mean pack
>animal/monster exploit.
>
>Bernwyn
